import React, {Component} from 'react'; import NavBar from './NavBar'; import { Button,Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Courses from '../Features/Courses'; import ProgressBar from 'react-bootstrap/ProgressBar' import{Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import firebase from '../firebase/base'; class AccInfo extends React.Component { state = { userType : null } componentDidMount(){ var user = firebase.auth().currentUser if(user){ console.log(user.uid) } firebase.auth().onAuthStateChanged(function(user) { if (user) { var db = firebase.firestore() db.collection('user').doc(user.uid) .get() .then(snapshot => { var userType = snapshot.data().type console.log(snapshot.data().type) }) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } else { }}) } render() { return(
